title: Dodgers
body:
So can we please get harsher penalties for dodgers....I am thinking a one day queue ban for first dodge, 1 week queue ban for second dodge then perm ban for third offence. They are welcome to ply against bots during the first and second offences. Lets clean up LoL from the filthy dodgers.

Thank you Riot, make it happen.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Roguestoney,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=FhIQvLse,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-11-12T23:06:58.702+0000)
>
> That's a bit extreme mate...

OK fine, down voted by 9 dodgers. Skip the perm ban and make it a 6 month ban. ;)

What the **** ......

Is this a troll post

So I get into a Ranked game where I am one win from promos to Gold V on the last day of the season, and I have 4 members lock in troll picks, ban my champ, and say they're going to run it down Mid. If I play, I lose about 20 LP, and will be 2-3 wins from promos, and by the time I get those wins the season will be an hour from ending, so I cannot get Gold V.

If I dodge, then I will be banned for something that isn't my fault, and because it's a ban, I lose my Silver rewards too. And those troller/inters will get away free and still get their rewards.

At least in the current system, I can dodge, lose 3 LP, still win 1 game to get into promos, and have enough time to get Gold V before the season ends.
Dodgers should certainly get punished but what you suggested is way too extreme, and I thought getting perma banned through talking in chat was bad.

Perma ban for dodging 3 times?

2/10 troll thread. You got 2 because it seems the two posters above me bought it. xD
